cab.content: This Qoo,nnTv,t is the Pioperty of^a?,;'.!', :V'.;'v\W& Government(P 162) From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 2397th January 1921.(Received 8th, 4 p.in.)Priority A.29 S. Secret. Afghan Treaty. Our telegratn of 15th December, 1431 S. Afghans at Mussoorie made it clear verbally that they hoped main outlet for sale of opium and charas would be Egypt. We are (? not) sure whether Egypt is now bound by Hague Convention and will be so bound under proposals for Egyptian independence. As Afghans will probably desire-information on this point, we shall be glad ,of telegraphic reply.m
